Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • Robot

  • public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Robot()
      Constructs a robot at grid location (0, 0).
      Robot(int x, int y, java.lang.String imageFile)
      Constructs a robot at a given grid location.

      Creates a vertical window at a given grid location.

      Checks whether there is a wall to the right of this robot.

      Makes this robot say something.

      Turns snapshots on or off.

      Turns this robot 90 degrees left.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Robot

        public Robot()
        Constructs a robot at grid location (0, 0). The robot faces east.

      • Robot

        public Robot(int x,
     int y,
     java.lang.String imageFile)
        Constructs a robot at a given grid location. The robot faces east.
        Parameters:
        x - the horizontal grid location of the robot
        y - the vertical grid location of the robot
        imageFile - the Robot image

    • Method Detail

      • moveForward

        public void moveForward()
        Moves this robot one step in the direction that it is facing.

      • turnRight

        public void turnRight()
        Turns this robot 90 degrees right.

      • turnLeft

        public void turnLeft()
        Turns this robot 90 degrees left.

      • say

        public void say(java.lang.String message)
        Makes this robot say something.
        Parameters:
        message - the text that the robot says

      • frontHasWallorWindow

        public boolean frontHasWallorWindow()
        Checks whether there is a wall or window in front of this robot.
        Returns:
        true if there is a wall or window, false if there is neither.

      • rightHasWall

        public boolean rightHasWall()
        Checks whether there is a wall to the right of this robot.
        Returns:
        true if there is a wall, false if there isn't a wall.

      • createHorizontalWall

        public void createHorizontalWall(double x,
                        double y)
        Creates a horizontal wall at a given grid location.
        Parameters:
        x - the horizontal grid location of the starting point of the wall
        y - the vertical grid location of the starting point of the wall

      • createVerticalWall

        public void createVerticalWall(double x,
                      double y)
        Creates a vertical wall at a given grid location.
        Parameters:
        x - the horizontal grid location of the starting point of the wall
        y - the vertical grid location of the starting point of the wall

        y - the vertical grid location of the starting point of the window

      • createVerticalWindow

        public void createVerticalWindow(double x,

        Creates a vertical window at a given grid location.
        Parameters:

        y - the vertical grid location of the starting point of the window

      • setSnapshots

        public void setSnapshots(boolean snapshots)
        Turns snapshots on or off.
        Parameters:
        snapshots - true to take snapshots before every move and turn
